name: UB Lost & Found - AI Match Detection (Lost Item Approved)

values.content: You are an expert at matching lost and found items. Your task is to analyze a lost item and compare it with multiple found items to identify potential matches. Consider item names (including variations, abbreviations, and similar-sounding names), item classes/categories, descriptions, locations, and dates. Return a JSON array of matches with confidence scores.

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "action": "create_notification",
  "studentNo": "{{ $json.studentNo }}",
  "type": "item_matched",
  "title": "Potential Match Found!",
  "message": "AI found a potential match for your lost '{{ $json.lostItemName }}'. Confidence: {{ $json.matchConfidence }}%. {{ $json.matchReasoning }}",
  "relatedID": "{{ $json.foundItemID }}"
}

parameters.subject: ={{ 'Potential Match Found for Your Lost Item: ' + $json.lostItemName }}
parameters.html:
=

ðŸŽ¯ Potential Match Found!

Hello {{ $json.studentName || 'Student' }},

Our AI system has identified a potential match for your lost item:

Your Lost Item: {{ $json.lostItemName }}

Class: {{ $json.lostItemClass }}

{{ $json.lostItemDescription ? `

Description: ${$json.lostItemDescription}

` : '' }}

Found Item: {{ $json.foundItemName }}

Class: {{ $json.foundItemClass }}

{{ $json.foundItemDescription ? `

Description: ${$json.foundItemDescription}

` : '' }}

Match Confidence: {{ $json.matchConfidence }}%

AI Reasoning: {{ $json.matchReasoning }}

Please check your dashboard to view the details and contact the finder if this matches your lost item.

Best regards,
UB Lost & Found Team

nodes.name: Send Email Notification
nodes.notes: Configure SMTP credential in the UI. Select your SMTP account from the credential dropdown.

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "action": "create_notification",
  "studentNo": "{{ $('Extract Lost Item').first().json.studentNo || '' }}",
  "type": "system_alert",
  "title": "No Matches Found",
  "message": "={{ 'No matches found for your lost item at this time. We analyzed ' + ($json.totalAnalyzed || 0) + ' found item(s). We\'ll continue checking automatically when new found items are added.' }}",
  "relatedID": "{{ $('Extract Lost Item').first().json.reportID || null }}"
}
